author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Reports Of Mark Zuckerberg's Confirmed Attendance Are Incorrect - House Energy & Commerce Committee Spokeswoman‍​
text:
March 28 (Reuters) -
* REPORTS OF FACEBOOK’S MARK ZUCKERBERG’S CONFIRMED ATTENDANCE ARE INCORRECT - HOUSE ENERGY & COMMERCE COMMITTEE SPOKESWOMAN‍​
* COMMITTEE IS CONTINUING TO WORK WITH FACEBOOK TO DETERMINE A DAY AND TIME FOR ZUCKERBERG TO TESTIFY- HOUSE ENERGY & COMMERCE COMMITTEE SPOKESWOMAN‍​ Further company coverage:
